meanings.definition: A small bus used for transporting passengers.
meanings.sent1: The microbusses arrived at the station to pick up the passengers.
meanings.sent2: I took the microbusses to get to work every day.
meanings.sent3: The microbusses decided to have a race to see who could reach the stop first.
meanings.sent4: The microbusses lined up like obedient children waiting for their turn.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow microbusses stood out among the other vehicles on the road.

meanings.sent1: There were many microbusses parked outside the museum.
meanings.sent2: The microbusses were all painted in different colors.
meanings.sent3: The microbusses gathered for a group photo, looking like a colorful fleet.
meanings.sent4: The fleet of microbusses resembled a pack of colorful candies.
meanings.sent5: The microbusses filled the street with a vibrant display of hues.
